title: The Dragon Knight Rescue
description: A baby dragon is lost in the Stormy Peaks! Can three brave knights find her before the thunderclouds roll in?

preview.tagline: Can you rescue the lost baby dragon before the big storm arrives?

ageRating.reason: Gentle adventure with friendly dragons and mild weather drama

prologue.worldIntro: Welcome to the Kingdom of Brightshield, where brave knights protect everyone — including the friendly dragons who live in the mountains! Dragons and knights are best friends here.

characterIntros.introText: Shield Knight is super brave and loves to protect friends! Shield Knight carries a magical golden shield that can block anything.
Swift Knight is fast and clever! Swift Knight can run like the wind and always finds the quickest path.
Kind Knight has the biggest heart in the kingdom! Kind Knight can calm scared creatures and make friends with anyone.

prologue.missionBrief: Oh no! Ember the baby dragon wandered off and got lost in the Stormy Peaks! A big thunderstorm is coming. The three knights must find Ember and bring her home safe!

characters.name: Shield Knight
characters.description: A brave knight with a magical golden shield that blocks anything

characters.name: Swift Knight
characters.description: A fast knight who runs like the wind and finds the quickest paths

characters.name: Kind Knight
characters.description: A gentle knight who calms scared creatures and makes friends easily

scenes.narrationText: Dark clouds gather over the Stormy Peaks. You hear a tiny 'SQUEAK!' echo from the mountains. That's Ember!

successOutcome.text: Zooming up the trail! A pawprint in the mud shows which way Ember went.

failOutcome.text: Tripped on a rock! But look — Ember's pawprint is right there in the mud!

successOutcome.text: Ears perked! Another tiny squeak comes from the left path. That way!

failOutcome.text: The wind is loud! But a friendly owl hoots and points with its wing. Thanks, owl!

successOutcome.text: The golden shield glows! Rocks bounce off harmlessly. Path clear!

failOutcome.text: The shield bonks a rock back — it breaks open and has sparkly crystals inside! Pretty!

successOutcome.text: Everyone dives behind a big boulder just in time! Safe and sound.

failOutcome.text: Oops, everyone lands in a pile! But the rocks miss. Group hug!

characterTurns.promptText: A scared bunny blocks the path!

successOutcome.text: Gentle words work! The bunny hops aside and shows a shortcut through the bushes.

failOutcome.text: The bunny is still nervous but hops along as a guide! New friend!

successOutcome.text: The bunny munches happily and hops aside. 'Thank you!' it seems to say.

failOutcome.text: The carrot rolls away and the bunny chases it — path clear! Silly bunny.

outcome.resultText: The knights find the mountain trail! Thunder rumbles in the distance.

scenes.narrationText: A wobbly rope bridge crosses a deep canyon. The wind is getting stronger! SQUEAK! Ember sounds closer!

successOutcome.text: Strong arms hold the ropes tight! The bridge stops swinging. Safe to cross!

failOutcome.text: The ropes wiggle free! But the bridge swings into a fun hammock shape. Wheee!

successOutcome.text: Brave steps across! The bridge holds. 'It's safe!' Shield Knight waves.

failOutcome.text: One board breaks! But Shield Knight grabs the rope and swings to the other side. Cool!

successOutcome.text: Zoom! Across before the wind even notices. 'Your turn!'

failOutcome.text: So fast the bridge bounces! Everyone bounces across like a trampoline. Boing!

successOutcome.text: Quick fingers tie a rope between everyone. Linked and safe!

failOutcome.text: The knot is silly-looking but holds tight! Fashion doesn't matter in rescues.

successOutcome.text: 'You can do it!' Works perfectly. Everyone crosses with big smiles.

failOutcome.text: Kind Knight holds hands with the scared one. Slower, but together!

successOutcome.text: The silly brave song makes everyone laugh and forget to be scared!

failOutcome.text: The song is off-key but SO funny everyone giggles all the way across!

outcome.resultText: Across the canyon! A shiny feather floats down as a reward.

scenes.narrationText: A grumpy Mountain Troll sits on the only path! 'NO PASS! Me napping!' But Ember's squeaks are just beyond!

successOutcome.text: The soft song works! The troll snores happily and rolls aside.

failOutcome.text: The troll says the singing is bad but SO bad it's funny. It laughs and moves.

successOutcome.text: The troll hugs the pillow and curls up happily. 'Okay, you pass.'

failOutcome.text: The pillow is too small! But the troll uses it as an eye mask. Good enough!

successOutcome.text: Silent steps! Past the troll without a sound. Ninja knights!

failOutcome.text: SNAP! A twig breaks! But the troll just mumbles 'five more minutes' and stays asleep.

successOutcome.text: The pebble bounces away! The troll turns to look and everyone slips past.

failOutcome.text: The pebble bonks the troll's nose! 'Ow! Pesky flies!' It swats the air while everyone runs past.

characterTurns.promptText: What if the troll wakes up?

successOutcome.text: Shield up! But the troll just yawns and waves everyone through. False alarm!

failOutcome.text: The shiny shield reflects sunlight into the troll's eyes! It covers its face and everyone passes.

successOutcome.text: An apple by the troll's hand! It smiles in its sleep. Kindness works!

failOutcome.text: The snack rolls and bonks the troll! But it eats it happily. 'Mmm, okay, go.'

outcome.resultText: Past the troll! You can see a cave ahead — and tiny dragon footprints!

scenes.narrationText: Inside the cave, baby Ember shivers on a ledge! She's scared of the thunder. Lightning flashes outside!

successOutcome.text: Soft words calm Ember. Her shivering stops. 'It's okay, we're here.'

failOutcome.text: Ember squeaks nervously but sees the kind face and waddles a little closer.

successOutcome.text: The warmest hug! Ember nuzzles in and stops shaking. Safe now.

failOutcome.text: Ember sneezes a tiny flame from nervousness! But then giggles and accepts the hug.

successOutcome.text: The golden shield blocks the scary lightning light! Ember relaxes.

failOutcome.text: The shield reflects lightning into rainbow sparkles! Ember thinks it's pretty!

successOutcome.text: The shield becomes a roof! A cozy little fort. Ember feels protected.

failOutcome.text: The fort is lopsided but Ember thinks it's the best fort ever!

successOutcome.text: Quick eyes spot stepping stones down the ledge. Perfect path!

failOutcome.text: The path is slippery! But everyone slides down like a fun slide. Wheee!

successOutcome.text: Arms open wide! Ember hops down and lands perfectly. Caught!

failOutcome.text: Ember jumps too far and everyone tumbles into a giggly pile!

outcome.resultText: You found Ember! She nuzzles everyone happily. Time to get home!

scenes.narrationText: The storm clears! A rainbow appears over the kingdom. Ember's mama dragon swoops down with happy tears!

successOutcome.text: The most noble bow! Mama dragon bows back with respect.

failOutcome.text: The helmet falls off mid-bow! Ember catches it and puts it back. Giggles!

successOutcome.text: The golden shield catches the rainbow light! Everyone oohs and aahs!

failOutcome.text: The shield is heavy and wobbles! Ember helps hold it up. Team effort!

successOutcome.text: The fastest, happiest lap ever! Everyone cheers!

failOutcome.text: So excited, trips over own feet! But turns it into a somersault. Ta-da!

successOutcome.text: Mama dragon gives everyone a ride through the rainbow! Best day ever!

failOutcome.text: Mama dragon is tired but Ember gives tiny piggyback rides. So cute!

successOutcome.text: The best goodbye hug! Ember squeaks 'I'll visit you!'

failOutcome.text: The hug is so tight Ember squeaks! But happy squeaks. Friends forever!

successOutcome.text: Pinky promise with a tiny dragon claw. Best friends forever!

failOutcome.text: Ember doesn't know what a pinky promise is but puts her whole paw in. Even better!

outcome.resultText: Mama dragon roars happily and the whole kingdom hears! 'The knights saved Ember!'

endings.title: Legendary Dragon Knights!
endings.narrationText: The King and Queen hold a grand feast in your honor! Mama dragon breathes fireworks into the sky. Ember gets a tiny knight helmet of her own. From this day on, you are the official Dragon Knights of Brightshield — called upon whenever a dragon needs help!

endings.title: Brave Knights!
endings.narrationText: Mama dragon gives you all warm dragon hugs! The kingdom celebrates with a party. Ember waves from her mama's back as they fly home. You'll always be her favorite knights!

endings.title: You Saved Ember!
endings.narrationText: Ember is home safe! It was a tricky adventure with lots of bumps and giggles, but you never gave up. Mama dragon smiles and promises Ember will come visit soon. Heroes!
